org.coniks.crypto

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.crypto.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements all cryptographic utility functions for CONIKS. Currently supported hash algorithms: SHA-256.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String HASH_ID
      The supported hashing scheme.
      static int HASH_SIZE_BITS
      The size of a SHA-256 hash in bits.
      static int HASH_SIZE_BYTES
      The size of a SHA-256 hash in bytes.

      Generates the cryptographic hash of input.

    • Method Detail

      • digest

        public static byte[] digest(byte[] input)
                     throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Generates the cryptographic hash of input. Current hashing algorithm: SHA-256.
        Returns:
        The hash as a byte[] or null in case of an error.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
